commentText: Runs the application and blocks the main thread and shutdown Camel graceful when the JVM is stopping.
codeText: public void run() {_        LOG.debug("Controller is starting and waiting for Spring-Boot to stop or JVM to terminate")__        try {_            main.run()__            _            LOG.debug("Waiting for CamelContext to complete shutdown")__            latch.await()__        } catch (Exception e) {_            throw new RuntimeException(e)__        }_        LOG.debug("CamelContext shutdown complete.")__    }
